about.bio: A visual architect and storyteller, I specialize in crafting compelling narratives through the language of motion and visual effects. With a foundation in cinematic principles and a relentless pursuit of technical innovation, I transform abstract concepts into tangible, emotive experiences. My studio is a laboratory where light, texture, and movement converge to build worlds, evoke emotion, and leave a lasting impact.

testimonials.quote: Vikas is a rare talent who combines world-class technical skill with a profound understanding of narrative pacing. He didn't just animate our assets; he gave our story a heartbeat.
testimonials.author: Ava Chen

testimonials.quote: Working with Vikas was a masterclass in collaboration. His creative vision is immense, yet he's incredibly receptive to feedback, making the entire process seamless and the final product extraordinary.
testimonials.author: Ben Carter

testimonials.quote: The level of polish and detail in his VFX work is second to none. Vikas delivered a sequence that became the most talked-about moment of our entire series.
testimonials.author: Olivia Reed

projects.title: Aetherium
projects.description: An award-winning short film title sequence exploring the formation of a mythical element. Using Houdini for particle simulations and Redshift for rendering, we created a visual ballet of cosmic dust and ethereal light, setting a tone of mystery and grandeur.

projects.title: Cybernetic Pulse
projects.description: A complete FUI (Futuristic User Interface) package for a AAA sci-fi game. Designed in Figma and animated in After Effects, the system includes dynamic HUDs, interactive menus, and environmental data visualizations, all built to enhance player immersion.

projects.title: Solstice
projects.description: Brand anthem video for a luxury solar energy company. This piece uses elegant, minimalist 3D animation to illustrate the relationship between the sun, technology, and nature. Rendered in Octane for photorealistic quality.

projects.title: The Silent City
projects.description: A title sequence for a post-apocalyptic drama. We used photogrammetry scans of abandoned locations and integrated them with stark, brutalist typography to create a haunting and atmospheric opening that establishes the show's world.

projects.title: Oracle
projects.description: A series of complex fluid and particle simulations for a high-concept perfume commercial. The visuals represent the scent's abstract notes transforming from liquid chaos into an elegant, structured form.

projects.title: Quantum Shift
projects.description: An explainer video for a quantum computing startup. We translated highly complex scientific principles into an accessible and visually stunning animated journey, using abstract geometric forms and a cohesive visual language to simplify the message.

projects.title: Terraforma
projects.description: A personal project exploring procedural world-building in Unreal Engine 5. This real-time environment showcases advanced techniques in foliage, atmospheric scattering, and dynamic lighting to create a photorealistic alien landscape.
